 2018-03682018-03-26ISED,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPersonal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act
SubjectBreach of Security Safeguards Regulations
PrecisBREACH OF SECURITY SAFEGUARDS REGULATIONS in order to ensure that (1) all Canadians will receive consistent information about data breaches that pose a risk of significant harm to them; (2) data breach notifications contain sufficient information to enable individuals to understand the significance and potential impact of the breach; (3) the Commissioner receives consistent and comparable information about data breaches that pose a risk of significant harm; and (4) the Commissioner is able to provide effective oversight and verify organizations are complying with the requirements to notify and report data breach.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0064 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
